trends: There have been 52 other sightings in Myrtle Beach
There was one other sighting in Myrtle Beach on or around July 18th 2012
divs: sighting details1. dinner with family in condo overlooking the atlantic ocean in myrtle beach 2. my uncle was having a cigar with my father and yelled for all of us to go out on the balcony. 3. at first i thought it was a star or plane or possibly a helicopter spotlight. 4. the lights would slowly increase from a small orange ball to a larger orange ball then after several seconds fade back out. it would perform the same movement farther down left of our sight line (north). next it would be back farther right (south). at one point there were three lights that turned on individually then faded to black individually. 5. n\a 6. the object failed to turn back on after several minutes and we went back to enjoying the evening discussing what it could be.
Summary: Orange light appeared then faded and appeared farther left. It faded out then appeared near initial spot. At one point two lights appeared simultaneously.
